mapper.select: select no, title, sender, receiver, to_char(rdate, 'yyyy-mm-dd AM hh:mi:ss') rdate, to_char(sdate, 'yyyy-mm-dd AM HH:MI:SS') sdate, name from message msg, member mb where receiver=#{id} and msg.receiver=mb.id and msg.sender=mb.id order by no desc
select count(*) from message where rdate is null and receiver=#{id}

select no, title, content, to_char(sdate, 'yyyy-mm-dd AM hh:mi:ss') sdate, sender, name, receiver, to_char(rdate, 'yyyy-mm-dd AM hh:mi:ss') rdate, fileName from message msg, member mb where no=#{no} and msg.sender=mb.id
mapper.update: update message set rdate=sysdate where no=#{no}
